flaws.name: Lose an
flaws.description: You lose a body part.

options.name: Arm/Hand
options.effect: Can no longer use two-handed weapons. Disadvantage on skill checks best done with two hands.

options.name: Leg
options.effect: Subtract 10 from walking speed, half swimming speed, disadvantage on Jump, half jump distance.

flaws.name: Faded
flaws.description: You become less corporeal and deal only half damage.

flaws.name: Choice Paralysis
flaws.description: When presented with a choice, you are incapable of making it and will defer to anyone else who does.

flaws.name: Vulnerability
flaws.description: Become vulnerable to a damage type.

flaws.name: Deformed
flaws.description: Your body develops a physical manifestation of Despair (horns, claws, harpoon arms, etc.).

flaws.name: Debt
flaws.description: Someone or something saves you; it will collect on that debt later.

flaws.name: Tormented
flaws.description: All future rolls for Despair are at disadvantage.

flaws.name: Conduit of Despair
flaws.description: Once per session the DM can force you into taking an action. Wisdom save DC 30 to resist. You may not crit on this save.

flaws.name: Broken Bonds
flaws.description: One of your Allies either dies or becomes a Nemesis.

flaws.name: Did you hear that?
flaws.description: You hear barely audible whispers. Your next Despair Roll is at Disadvantage.

flaws.name: Gaps in Memory
flaws.description: The other players work with the DM to determine something awful your character did that it doesn't remember up to a year ago. You will have no memory of it but everyone else involved knows.

flaws.name: Self Doubt
flaws.description: You second guess your every move. You now fumble on a 1 or 2 until your next crit success.

flaws.name: Chronic Fatigue
flaws.description: The character cannot rest properly â€” dreams are replaced by memories of terror or prophetic nightmares. You are always at 1 level of Exhaustion.

flaws.name: Ennui
flaws.description: Suffer a D4 reduction to your AC at the start of every combat.

flaws.name: Hypervigilant
flaws.description: You gain Advantage on Perception checks.

flaws.name: It's all in your head
flaws.description: You believe you are suffering a Physical ailment no matter what evidence is presented otherwise.

flaws.name: Lure of Darkness
flaws.description: You become obsessed with a location and take 1 level of Exhaustion every long rest where you have not grown closer to that location.

flaws.name: Negativity Bias
flaws.description: Everyone hates you. Disadvantage on Insight

flaws.name: People Pleaser
flaws.description: Add half of your Proficiency modifier (min 1) to any skill check you assist on in addition to the normal Advantage. You are at Disadvantage on any action you perform where someone else is aiding you.

flaws.name: Unlucky
flaws.description: You are plagued by misfortune. You may not roll natural 20s on attack rolls, ability checks, or saving throws until your next long rest.

flaws.name: Phobia
flaws.description: You develop an irrational fear of a common creature or object (DM's choice). You have Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls when interacting with or being attacked by the source of your phobia.

flaws.name: Ritual Path
flaws.description: You are called to perform a dark ritual. You are shown more of the ritual over time as you take on more Despair.

flaws.name: Social Anxiety
flaws.description: You suffer a -1 to all Charisma rolls for every person within 10' of you.

flaws.name: Weird
flaws.description: You develop an off putting tick or obsession (your choice)

flaws.name: Shaky Grip
flaws.description: Hands tremble when holding weapons, tools, or delicate objects, especially in tense situations. Checks that involve your hands are at disadvantage.

flaws.name: Emotionally Hollow
flaws.description: The character struggles to connect with allies; extreme joy or sadness feels muted or absent. Disadvantage on Persuasion and Deception checks.
